Original: You have come! As you surmised, that
request is from the Outland Count...
He has a new mark for you to find.
[Page]
A new document provides clues to its
location. Go on! Hurry and see the
Outland Count!
[Page]
I shall eagerly await your swift
return and the tale that follows...!
Translation: You have come! As you surmised, that
request is from the Outland Count...
He has a new mark for you to find.
[Page]
A new document provides clues to its
location. Go on! Hurry and see the
Outland Count!
[Page]
I shall eagerly await your swift
return and the tale that follows...!

Original: Very good work. Once again, you easily
fulfill the appointed task... It was
an earth mark this time?
[Page]
Water... fire... earth... Three marks
so far. Does it also seem to you that
another request will be posted soon?
[Page]
I simply have a feeling. At any rate,
here is the reward you were promised.
Translation: Very good work. Once again, you easily
fulfill the appointed task... It was
an earth mark this time?
[Page]
Water... fire... earth... Three marks
so far. Does it also seem to you that
another request will be posted soon?
[Page]
I simply have a feeling. At any rate,
here is the reward you were promised.

Original: Ah, so you accepted again. Then I am
saved the bother of an explanation.
[Page]
We have found yet another Imperial
document. Pay careful attention as
I read this one aloud...
Translation: Ah, so you accepted again. Then I am
saved the bother of an explanation.
[Page]
We have found yet another Imperial
document. Pay careful attention as
I read this one aloud...

Original: "As mentioned, there are two starting
points in [Color:5]A-1[Color:0]. We have successfully
excavated [Color:5][Codename: Trigger][Color:0].
[Page]
"If you enter the starting point with
[Color:5][Codename: Gatekeeper][Color:0] simultaneously,
it should guide you to the reaction."
Translation: "As mentioned, there are two starting
points in [Color:5]A-1[Color:0]. We have successfully
excavated [Color:5][Codename: Trigger][Color:0].
[Page]
"If you enter the starting point with
[Color:5][Codename: Gatekeeper][Color:0] simultaneously,
it should guide you to the reaction."

Original: That is the long and short of it.
Before, I had no idea how to solve
this, but this changes things.
[Page]
Perhaps the mark mentioned here is
like the water and fire marks that
we discovered.
[Page]
If that is the case... But you know
where I am going with this by now.
[Page]
I want you to get the mark in this
document to [Color:5]react[Color:0] and report its
location to me. I'm counting on you.
Translation: That is the long and short of it.
Before, I had no idea how to solve
this, but this changes things.
[Page]
Perhaps the mark mentioned here is
like the water and fire marks that
we discovered.
[Page]
If that is the case... But you know
where I am going with this by now.
[Page]
I want you to get the mark in this
document to [Color:5]react[Color:0] and report its
location to me. I'm counting on you.

Original: Ah, hello, my friends. Did you get
the mark to react and reveal its
location?
Translation: Ah, hello, my friends. Did you get
the mark to react and reveal its
location?

Original: [Color:5]Did you find the mark?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Did you find the mark?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: Hmm... Well, I wish you luck. I have
confidence in you, my friends! And
so does Margherita.
Translation: Hmm... Well, I wish you luck. I have
confidence in you, my friends! And
so does Margherita.

Original: More information, eh? Then let me read
the document aloud once more...
Translation: More information, eh? Then let me read
the document aloud once more...

Original: That is all that is written. We do not
yet know the starting point... we must
simply comb the [Color:5]A-1[Color:0] region.
[Page]
What vexes me more is the part about
entering the starting point at the
same time as this "Gatekeeper"...
Translation: That is all that is written. We do not
yet know the starting point... we must
simply comb the [Color:5]A-1[Color:0] region.
[Page]
What vexes me more is the part about
entering the starting point at the
same time as this "Gatekeeper"...

Original: Is that so!? Another success for my
favorite explorers! Now then, where
might we find this mark?
Translation: Is that so!? Another success for my
favorite explorers! Now then, where
might we find this mark?

Original: Very well. I shall send my scouts to
investigate as soon as possible.
Translation: Very well. I shall send my scouts to
investigate as soon as possible.

Original: I may have to withdraw the compliment
I gave you...
[Page]
There seemed to be no mark where you
spoke of. Maybe the coordinates were
off? You... did activate the mark...?
[Page]
Whatever the reason, this result is
unacceptable! I am left with nothing
but the awkward praise I gave you!
[Page]
I need verifiable information. Next
time, make the mark react and give
me the correct location.
Translation: I may have to withdraw the compliment
I gave you...
[Page]
There seemed to be no mark where you
spoke of. Maybe the coordinates were
off? You... did activate the mark...?
[Page]
Whatever the reason, this result is
unacceptable! I am left with nothing
but the awkward praise I gave you!
[Page]
I need verifiable information. Next
time, make the mark react and give
me the correct location.

Original: Congratulations, my friends! You've
done it! My scouts found the mark
just where you said it would be!
[Page]
The reports say that given its shape,
it appears to be the earth mark.
That's three so far...
[Page]
We still don't know what they're for.
Perhaps we'll never know... But that
is all part of the research process!
[Page]
Now, my friends, the request is
complete. Go to the bar and collect
your reward.
Translation: Congratulations, my friends! You've
done it! My scouts found the mark
just where you said it would be!
[Page]
The reports say that given its shape,
it appears to be the earth mark.
That's three so far...
[Page]
We still don't know what they're for.
Perhaps we'll never know... But that
is all part of the research process!
[Page]
Now, my friends, the request is
complete. Go to the bar and collect
your reward.

Original: We've found water, fire, and now an
earth mark... If they relate to the
basic elements...
[Page]
Can you not see where this is going,
my friends? The next request should
be posted very soon, I think...
Translation: We've found water, fire, and now an
earth mark... If they relate to the
basic elements...
[Page]
Can you not see where this is going,
my friends? The next request should
be posted very soon, I think...

Original: You thoroughly survey the area and
suddenly chance upon a small Imperial
flag just below your skyship.
Translation: You thoroughly survey the area and
suddenly chance upon a small Imperial
flag just below your skyship.

Original: All of a sudden, you hear a strangely
familiar sound from the [Color:5]east[Color:0]!
Something has happened...
Translation: All of a sudden, you hear a strangely
familiar sound from the [Color:5]east[Color:0]!
Something has happened...

Original: As you hunt for the origin of the
strange noise, you spy a faint glow
arising from the stone pavement.
[Page]
This would appear to be the source
of the strange sound...
[Page]
It is marked with an engraving that
symbolizes the earth. This must be
the mark you sought!
[Page]
Now, you need only copy down its
location and report it to the Count.
Translation: As you hunt for the origin of the
strange noise, you spy a faint glow
arising from the stone pavement.
[Page]
This would appear to be the source
of the strange sound...
[Page]
It is marked with an engraving that
symbolizes the earth. This must be
the mark you sought!
[Page]
Now, you need only copy down its
location and report it to the Count.

Original: As you make a thorough search of the
area, you spy a faint glow arising
from the earth at your feet.
Translation: As you make a thorough search of the
area, you spy a faint glow arising
from the earth at your feet.
